title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 35.9 - Record retention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 35.9 - Record retention

State Regulations

Every title insurance agent shall retain any notice or disclosure that is provided pursuant to this Part in accordance with the requirements set forth in Part 20.4 of this Title (Insurance Regulation 29-A) and this Part. Notes

35.9

Adopted

New

York State Register October 18, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 42, eff. 10/18/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
